venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Hello Ex-Midwesterners, well I asked what you wanted to do for your next event and it was unanimous. You guys are Big Ten College Football junkies so lets do it!!

I found a great place to watch all the Big Ten college football games called "The Tavern Square" which is located less then 5 minutes from Central Square T Stop on the Redline. The manager promised me this was a great place to watch games as they have an enourmous amount of TV's.

So on October 31st at 3:30 P.M. lets meet at The Tavern Square to watch the Michigan vs. Illinois game which is in between a prior game and another one at 8pm. I know its Halloween but I figured what a better way to celebrate the Fall Holiday with College Football, Good Friends and of course lots of "Fall Flavored Beer".

Please RSVP as soon as you know on the Meetup website, I have to give the manager a count about a week before so I can reserve us tables. Looking forward to seeing everybody then!

Steve Rosen
Assistant Organizer
item.name: Halloween College Football Fest
